tool_description: Renders planet glyphs at their calculated positions on the natal chart with collision detection and label positioning.

show_degree_labels.description: Whether to show degree positions next to planets

collision_avoidance.description: Whether to adjust positions to avoid overlapping symbols

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: planet_names, coordinates, and symbols arrays must have the same length.
Invalid coordinates: All coordinate values must be numeric.
Empty symbol data: Each planet must have a corresponding symbol.
Coordinate out of bounds: Planet positions must be within the chart canvas area.
usage: Input planet data from previous tools including names, coordinates, and symbols. Renders planets on the chart with optional degree labels and collision avoidance.

adjusted_positions.description: Indicates which planet positions were adjusted for collision avoidance

final_x_coords.description: Final X coordinates after collision adjustment

final_y_coords.description: Final Y coordinates after collision adjustment
